attributes.action: MPs should be made to answer to the Public
attributes.additional_details: MP’s should be made to answer to the public if they break the rules. It is wrong MPs police themselves. We need a group of people from all MP’s ward with no political bias to sit and judge MPs if they are failing the public and or break the rules. They should have the power to fine an MP and or dismiss the MP. And if it is a criminal offence such as fraud then it should be down to this group to pass it on to the Police it is wrong that MP’s always look after their own it is time they where accountable to the public.
